blanket knitting pattern design by fifty four ten studio © 2024 skill level - easy temperature blanket project plan this blanket is knit in garter stitch knit every row in three panels that are seamed together select 10 - 25 colors of worsted #4 weight yarn to represent the daily high temperature for your location for one calendar year decide on 10° or 5° temperature increments and assign one yarn color to each temperature category refer to diagram on page 5 each blanket panel is 15 wide the first panel left represents the first four months of the year the center panel represents may through september 1st the third panel right represents the last four months of the year ending at the bottom right corner with december 31st the three panels are seamed together with yarn a tapestry needle and mattress stitch please see detailed information on planning a temperature blanket on fiftyfourtenstudio com finished size - approximately 45 wide x 58 long supplies  worsted #4 weight yarn at least 2 900 3 100 yards in an assortment of 10 - 25 yarn colors i used berroco vintage worsted yarn in 14 colorways shop jimmy beans wool local yarn shops more details on yarn & colors on my website bit ly/howtoplanatempblanketknittingproject  us size 8 straight or circular knitting needles or size best suited for your yarn and knitting gauge  tapestry needle  temperature blanket planner - click here to download the free pdf gauge garter stitch with us size 8 needles 18 sts & 34 row 17 garter ridges = 4 take time to check gauge by casting on 25 stitches and knit every row garter stitch for at least 5 exact gauge is not essential but you want to make sure you have the appropriate needle size for your yarn and knitting gauge and a significantly different gauge may require more or less yarn and impact finished size of blanket pattern notes & tips first stitch of row i tend to pull the first stitch of each row just a bit tighter i do not use the slip first stitch method because a fairly invisible seam can be achieved without slipping the first stitch right side of knitting pick the right side of knitting based on more attractive side of cast on edge click here to see photos on my website clip marker use a clip on marker to identify right side rs of project this is helpful for beginners changing colors always change from one yarn color to next when beginning a
